page.title: 02Whitwell Village
page.content: Whitwell is a{rural village}set amongst downs and farmland two miles north of Ventnor, and has a main road,the High Street, running north south, with estate developments on either side behind it, and a junction road leading to Niton, the next village a mile or so away. At this junction stands the parish church and its churchyard, dating from the 12th century, and in the High Street is 'The White Horse' public house built in the 15th century. Further down the High Street are old character cottages, some of which are thatched, interspersed with modern building.
